paper_abstract: We study bispecial factors in fixed points of morphisms. In particular, we propose a simple method of finding all bispecial words of non-pushy circular DOL-systems. This method can be formulated as an algorithm. Moreover, we prove that non-pushy circular DOL-systems are exactly those with finite critical exponents. (C) 2012 Published by Elsevier B.V.
paper_title: Bispecial factors in circular non-pushy DOL languages
